name: Metaenter
body:
Create a Facebook like input box in seconds. Functionality like toggle submit on enter, new line on shift + enter, and submit on meta-key + enter. ## Basic usage ```javascript $("textarea").metaenter(); ``` ## Settings with standard values ```javascript { useDiv: true, // Use a div instead of textarea useFacebookStyle: true, // Use checkbox modus useCounter: true, // Show letter counter form: false, // Set form to submit. Default false (auto find) minHeight: 40, // height in pixels maxHeight: 400, // max height in pixels checboxLbl: "Activate submit on return" // Text for checkbox if facebook style } ``` ## Demo Example with default settings ### Initialization ```javascript $("textarea").metaenter(); ``` ### Markup ```html
Input field in a seperate form

``` ### Result
tagline: A simple jQuery plugin for simulating a facebook-like text input.
